mediaAssets.alt: Announcing general availability of robotic process automation in Power Automate
How to create a UI flow to perform basic functions

items.name: Introduction to desktop flows
items.description: Power Automate Desktop broadens the existing robotic process automation (RPA) capabilities in Power Automate

items.name: Set up Power Automate Desktop
items.description: Before you can use your device to create desktop flows, you'll need to ensure it meets the requirements outlined here.

items.name: Create a Power Automate Desktop flow
items.description: Desktop flows are used to automate tasks on the Web or the desktop. Using Power Automate Desktop you can automate tasks on the desktop as well as the Web.

items.name: Run attended and unattended desktop flows
items.description: After you've created and tested a desktop flow, you can run it from an event, schedule, or button. To make this possible, add your desktop flow to an automated flow, a instant flow, a scheduled flow, or a business process flow.
